title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2371/95 of 9 October 1995 repealing Regulation (EC) No 2030/95 concerning the stopping of fishing for sprat by vessels flying the flag of Sweden
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2371/95 of 9 October 1995 repealing Regulation (EC) No 2030/95  concerning the stopping of fishing for sprat by vessels flying the flag of Sweden
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 2847/93 of 12 October 1993 establishing a control  system applicable to the common fisheries policy  (1), and in particular Article 21 (3) thereof,
Whereas Commission Regulation (EC) No 2030/95  (2) stopped fishing for sprat in the waters of ICES  division IIIb, c, d (EC-zone) by vessels flying the flag of Sweden or registered in Sweden;
Whereas Finland transferred to Sweden 12  000 tonnes of sprat in the waters of ICES division IIIb,  c, d (EC-zone); whereas fishing for sprat in the waters of ICES division IIIb, c, d (EC-zone) by  vessels flying the flag of Sweden or registered in Sweden should therefore be permitted; whereas  consequently it is necessary to repeal Regulation (EC) No 2030/95,
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the  Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 October 1995.
For the Commission Emma BONINO Member of the Commission
